name: Hampton Roads DevFest 2026
description: A unique gathering spotlighting local speakers and showcasing our community's diverse talent. Organized by RevolutionVA, a 501(c)(3) non-profit dedicated to advancing software development education throughout Virginia. Ideal for developers, industry veterans, students, and tech enthusiasts looking to network, learn, and celebrate Hampton Roads' tech achievements.
